column4: i've never worked with linux before so i have no idea. If I install ubuntu on a USB stick, will I be able to install software and use them, or will it be as if i was inserting a live cd?
You can install software if you are using a USB stick (of course assuming you have room).
It's basically no different than a hard-disk.
I have shakey results with USB. Depends a lot on the BOIS. Good luck.
